thread.title: Chengdu hosts summit on internet + tourismTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Chengdu hosts summit on internet + tourismTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Chengdu hosts summit on internet + tourismTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Chengdu hosts summit on internet + tourism Published on : Wednesday, September 30, 2015
At the 4th Global Travel E-commerce Conference held in China, Dr. Liao Ming (Principal of Marketing Science of Facebook in APAC), Yu Dunde (CEO of Tuniu) and Hao Kangli (Director-General of the Tourism Administration of Sichuan Province) delivered keynote speeches about the Winning Ways of Social Media and Big Data Marketing, Innovation of Online Travel and “Internet + Tourism” or “Tourism + Internet”.
The conference “Simplicity Powering Internet+” was held in the City of Dujiangyan from September 21 to 23, 2015. About 400 guests from over 70 famous tourism website companies such as Google, Facebook, Phocuswright, agoda, Travelzoo, Baidu, Ctrip, Tuniu, LY, Qunar, Alitrip and Lvmama, and the top management of network operators in the USA, Ireland, Germany, Switzerland, India and Japan got together in Dujiangyan and sought for Taoism in Qingcheng Mountain.
This conference was hosted by the Chengdu Municipal People’s Government and the Tourism Administration of Sichuan Province. In this conference, focus was on the further discussion of the integrative development of “Internet+” and “Tourism+” based on the successful experience from the previous three conferences, and the essential cooperation of local tourism enterprises in Sichuan and well-known domestic and foreign OTAs was improved through the “Young Leader Summit” and “One on One Trade Fair.”
The following guests delivered three speeches in different themes: Chen Jianhao (Vice President of Google in China), Simon Hauswirth (Strategy and Business Development Vice President of Kuoni Travel), Bobby Healy (CTO of CarTrawler), Robin Harries (Enterprise Development President of Trivago in APAC, Tim Hughes (Business Development Vice President of Agoda), Paloma Meng (Chief Representative in Asia of HostelWorld), Zhou Tao (Professor of UESTC), Karthik Venkataraman (Business Development President of Ezeego One Travel and Tours), Metin Altun (CEO of Met Global), Gaurav Chiripal (CEO of QuadLabs), Kei Shibata (CEO of Venture Republic), Song Haiquan (Director General of Langzhong Culture and Tourism Bureau), principals of travel agencies, famous CEOs in the world and principals of tourism authorities.
